effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.

short_effect.black-white: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.

flavor_text.black-white: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.
